column2: We have been declared a threat to world stability due to our aggressive nature. The effects will be made worse if we keep down this path.
During our aggressive expansion we have made many enemies. Together they have formed a coalition against us, we must be on the defense.
The Colonial Ministry is actively working to assimilate the Ainu into the Yamato Race.
The Clock Tower derives its nickname from the bell, the Big Ben. With an extreme accuracy, the clock tower dominates life and work in London, always striking on time.
Reconstruction of the Palace of Westminster
The Palace of Westminster is being reconstructed and with it, a huge clock tower.
